Tour Highlights

Scenic Lake Journey

Cruise across serene waters to reach our small, authentic island home. Experience the serenity of Twin Lakes from a local's perspective.

Island Mountain Hike

Take a guided walk to panoramic viewpoints overlooking both lakes, with stories of island life shared by your local guide.

Family & Food Experience

Meet Abiathar's family and taste authentic local dishes prepared by island residents. Experience true Rwandan hospitality in our family home.

Traditional Brewing

Discover the ancient art of banana beer making, a tradition passed down through generations on our small island community.

Your Local Guide

Abiathar Ihimbazwe

Native Islander & Cultural Expert

Born and raised on Batutsi Island, Abiathar knows all 17 families (about 200 people) who call this island home. This intimate community offers an authentic glimpse into traditional Rwandan island life.

With family still on the island, Abiathar provides a genuine local perspective you won't find in typical tourist experiences.

Location

Batutsi Island is located in the stunning Twin Lakes region (Lake Burera and Lake Ruhondo) near Ruhengeri, Rwanda. The island offers breathtaking views of the surrounding volcanic mountains and crystal-clear waters.

Meeting Point

This is where you'll meet your guide before heading to the boat. Easy to find and accessible from Musanze.

Meeting Point Location

Twin Lakes Tours

See photos, reviews and more details on our Google Business profile

Twin Lakes Tours Rwanda

Tour Itinerary

1

Pick-up & Departure

30 minutes

Your journey begins with a pick-up from Musanze or meet at the designated location. We'll ensure you're comfortable before heading to the lake. Meet at the designated location .

2

Boat Ride to Batutsi Island

20 minutes

Enjoy a scenic boat ride across the crystal-clear waters of Twin Lakes. Take in the breathtaking views of the surrounding volcanic mountains as we approach the island.

3

Mountain Hike

45 minutes

Upon arrival, we'll embark on a short hike up the mountain. The trail offers panoramic views of both lakes and the surrounding landscape – perfect for photos!

4

Banana Beer Making

30 minutes

Learn about the traditional process of making banana beer, a local specialty. You'll see how the islanders have preserved this cultural practice for generations.

5

Family Visit & Local Food

45 minutes

Meet Abiathar's family and experience genuine Rwandan hospitality. Enjoy authentic local cuisine prepared with fresh ingredients from the island.

6

Community Tour

30 minutes

Visit the island's church and school to learn about community life. Interact with locals and gain insights into their daily routines and traditions.

7

Island Circumnavigation

30 minutes

Board the boat again for a scenic ride around the islands, offering different perspectives and photo opportunities of this hidden gem.

8

Return Journey

20 minutes

We'll head back to the mainland, where your transportation will be waiting to take you to your next destination.

Tour Start Times:

8:00 AM - 12:00 PM (Choose your preferred time when booking)

Personalized Experience:

Abiathar works closely with each group to ensure a flexible and personalized experience.

Book Your Tour

Ready to experience the beauty and culture of Batutsi Island? Contact Abiathar directly via WhatsApp to arrange your tour.
